name: Final Hope Beta
description:
First public build of my project that I am working on 'Final Hope'. This game is a old school style 16bit turned based RPG. This demo will only allow chapter 1 to be playable. Please leave me your thoughts and feedback regarding the game. I can be reached at 'littlesoftworks@outlook.com' 

*Works best with a Xbox 360 or XboxOne Controller*
